c74object.name: j.plug.parameter
c74object.digest: Define a parameter to be controlled in the host environment
c74object.description: The plug.parameter# defines a parameter to be controlled in the host environment. It outputs a Jamoma dictionary to be connected other Graph or AudioGraph objects.

attribute.name: range
attribute.digest: The numerical range covered by the parameter.
attribute.description: The numerical range covered by the parameter.

attribute.name: style
attribute.digest: Indicates special treatment for the parameter for ui generation
attribute.description: Indicates special treatment for the parameter for ui generation

attribute.name: default
attribute.digest: Specifies a default value for the parameter.
attribute.description: Specifies a default value for the parameter.

method.name: int
method.digest: Set the value of the parameter.
method.description: Set the value of the parameter.

method.name: float
method.digest: Set the value of the parameter.
method.description: Set the value of the parameter.
